mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatfunction(fszName, jszName, fsContext,isyidu) VALUES (#{fszName},#{jszName}, #{fsContext},#{isyidu});
mapper.select: select * from ( select * from chatfunction where chatfunction.fszName=#{fszName} and chatfunction.jszName=#{jszName} UNION ALL select * from chatfunction where chatfunction.jszName=#{fszName} and chatfunction.fszName=#{jszName}) a ORDER BY a.fsTime asc
